Package io.github.ryanproulx

Class Store

java.lang.Object
io.github.ryanproulx.Store
public class Store extends Object
The store is responsible for handling any requests from the user interface to add products to their shopping cart, and to complete a checkout process. It has access to the Warehouse to determine inventory stock and prices.

    • Store

      public Store(Warehouse warehouse, UserInterface ui, ShoppingCart cart)
      Parameters:
      warehouse - Warehouse contains an inventory and prices of all products in the system.
      ui - User interface used to add items to the shopping cart and complete purchases.
      cart - Shopping cart used to store items.

  • Method Details

    • shop

      public void shop()

    • addToCart

      public boolean addToCart(String sku)
      Adds products as items to a user's shopping cart. If a product does not exist, or there are not enough left in the inventory, the item will not be added to the cart. This method currently has one promotion tied to it.
      Parameters:
      sku - SKU identifier of a product to be added to the cart by a user.
      Returns:
      Boolean return if a product can be added to the cart.

    • getWarehouseInventory

      public Collection<Product> getWarehouseInventory()
      Returns:
      All products currently listed in the warehouse.

      public String checkOut()
